mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.district_name district, c.block_name block, d.residence_name, e.building_no FROM statistics.mac_info a LEFT JOIN ocn_address.of_district b ON a.district_id = b.district_id LEFT JOIN df_estate_db_v2.sh_block c ON a.block_id = c.block_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.of_residence d ON a.residence_id = d.id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.of_building e ON a.building_id = e.id WHERE a.mac = #{mac} LIMIT 0,1
